item.title: Network CI and Open Source
item.description: Introduction Wow, it’s been a long time since my last blog post. I recently attended the first AutoCon event focusing on network automation. Long story short, it was terrific. Check it out and be on the lookout for the next one. Shortly after AutoCon, two community members sprung up with sweet blog posts. My colleague and friend Dan Hertzberg are resurrecting the blog. The first post went over leveraging ygot to create Go structs.
